channel.title: I need help!
channel.description: Ok i found a very nice source the other day. and i played another server with it before with those commands ::home and ::pk2 but the problem is that i wanted to add a teleblock but i didnt exactly know how i mean like if your in combat fighting a npc or player you shouldnt be able to teleport to pk2 or home thats what i need help with please reply with a code Ps its a 317 server not delta heres what commands looks like [img]http://i26.tinypic.com/33cvx8g.jpg[/img] if you have any related questions heres my msn shadow-night1@hotmail.com

item.title: I need help!
